scripts.start: node_modules/.bin/ttab -t 'Node Server' 'NODE_ENV=development npm run ts-node-dev' && node_modules/.bin/ttab -t 'Building assets' 'npm run build'
scripts.dev-server: forever stopall && echo 'Running on http://localhost:8080' && NODE_ENV=development forever start -c 'node_modules/.bin/ts-node' $npm_package_main -m 5000 --pretty && forever list
scripts.build: npm run build:js:watch & npm run build:css:watch
scripts.build:css: npm run css:clean && npm run css:compile && npm run css:rev
scripts.css:compile: npm run css:compile:slim && node-sass --output-style compressed -o public/css/ resources/css/bundles/
scripts.build:js: npm run js:clean && npm run js:compile && npm run js:rev && npm run js:move
scripts.js:compile: rollup --config --environment FETCHINJECTVERSION:$(npm list --depth=0 | grep fetch-inject | sed 's/[^0-9.]*\([0-9.]*\).*/\1/')
scripts.test:all: npm run test:css && npm run ts && NODE_PORT=3300 npm run test-server && NODE_PORT=3300 npm run test:js && NODE_PORT=3300 npm run test:integration && forever stopall
scripts.test:js: npm run ts && jest tests/unit && standardx 'app.js' 'resources/js/*.ts' 'app/**/*.js' | snazzy
scripts.integration: NODE_PORT=3300 npm run test-server && NODE_PORT=3300 jest tests/integration --detectOpenHandles
scripts.travis-master: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run test:all
scripts.travis: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run test:js && npm run test:css
scripts.removeCompiled: branch=$(git branch | grep \* | cut -d ' ' -f2) && if test "$branch" != "master" ; then git reset HEAD public/ ; fi
scripts.release: git checkout latest-build && npm run build && git add dist/*.js dist/*.js.map -f && git commit -m 'create build'
